title: Such amenities or facilities (i) and (ii) above shall be deemed to be designations or reservations in the DP thereafter
clause_text: Such amenities or facilities (i) and (ii) above shall be deemed to be designations or reservations in the DP thereafter.
section: In Plots/lay-outs of the land admeasuring 4000 sq. m or more:
